subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Robin van Persie’s goal on a penalty kick in the third minute helped propel the Dutch past the Brazilians, who were unable to recover from a semifinal rout and were booed by the home fans.
snippet: Robin van Persie’s goal on a penalty kick in the third minute helped propel the Dutch past the Brazilians, who were unable to recover from a semifinal rout and were booed by the home fans.
